args: Ha ha... Let them have their fun. The whole\npoint of summer break is to cut loose a bit.
I suppose there's some sense to that. \nEveryone HAS been working hard of late.
Exactly. That's why I hope we can all\nenjoy this little getaway to the fullest!
This guy gets it! This season is for one\nthing and one thing only: doing as little\nas humanly possible.
Mitsuhide has the right of it.\nSummer break is for—wait. What?
Um, yeah? Hi?\nWhy's everybody so surprised?
Any sensible person would be! What are\nyou doing here? And how long have you\nbeen amongst us?
A couple minutes, tops. I only just now\nmanaged to catch up.
A little birdie told me you folks were\nhitting the beach, so I came all the way\nfrom Hinomoto to join in the fun!
I... I see. And your purpose here is...?
Uhhh, to enjoy the sun, surf, and sand?
I ask this strictly for confirmation, but...\nYou've a role of some importance in\nHinomoto, do you not?
Yeah, I guess? I'm one of the twelve\nWyrmclan leaders, at least officially.
Yes, ＂officially＂ in the sense that you are\nliterally, in point of fact, one of the twelve\nWyrmclan leaders! *sigh* In any case...
I've heard Hinomoto is suffering through an\nuncommonly hot summer this year. Is this\ntruly the time for leisure travel?
Yeaaah, about that... I told my people\nI was stepping out for a while. They can\nhandle things while I'm gone. Probably.
All jokes aside, I genuinely needed a\nbreak. Lately it's been nothing but work,\nwork, work, day in and day out.
So I came all this way to spend my\nprecious summer break with you folks:\nmy dear friends.
Well, it's certainly true that the Wyrmclan\nleaders always seem to have their hands\nfull.
And seeing as I just finished extolling the\nmerits of the occasional respite from work,\nI think it only fair I invite you to join ours!
Now that that's settled, I look forward to\nhaving you all as attendan—er, beach\nbuddies! Ahhh, the fun we'll have together.
The hateful sun! The murderous heat! Are\nAlberian summers always this miserable?
It's not usually quite this bad. Seems this\nsummer is a scorcher everywhere.
Whaaat? I came all the way from\nHinomoto to get AWAY from it all.
We're splitting open a watermelon\nblindfolded over there. Fancy a whack?
Ooh, that sounds like fun. Mitsuhide?
Hmmm... I do enjoy watermelon, but that\nsounds suspiciously like physical labor.\nYou're really doing that in this heat?
Well, yeah! What screams summer more\nthan bashing open a gourd with a two-by-\nfour while the sun turns you extra-crispy?
...Do you have brain worms or something?
Estelle and I are putting together a beach\nvolleyball game after this, and we're\nlooking for members. Care to join?
Exercising, on a day like this?\nOn purpose? I'm dizzy just hearing it.
Oh, come on! What could be better\nvolleyball weather than a nice, clear\nday like today? It's perfect out!
Not the word I would choose to describe an\nattempted homicide on the sun's part, but\nyou do you...
A-HA! So this is where you've been hiding.
And now it's Celliera. How can we help\nyou, armsmaster?
I'm so glad you asked! What do you say...\nto holding an intensive training camp?!
Exactly! I'm happy to set everything up.\nYou'll leave with more information in your\nnoggin than you ever wanted or needed!
Picture this: bodies sweating together on\nthe hot sand, pushing each other that extra\nmile... You'll glisten like the summer sun!
And at the end of it all, I'll give your poor,\nabused muscles the hands-on help of a\nseasoned instructor. What do you say?!
Is this the part where I make an\nopen show of how appalled I am?
Yup. Sorry, Celliera, but I'm with\nMs. Mousy on this one.
Training camp gets a hard pass from me!\nNow, if you'll excuse me, there's a melon\nwith my name on it. Coming, Mitsuhide?
Whoa, hey, hold on! We need people for\nvolleyball or none of us can play.
Please, Mitsuhide?! You have to team up\nwith me to take down Estelle and Amane!
Look, I definitely never agreed to—
What are you saying, Patia?!\nAnd you call yourself a knight?
Training doesn't go on summer vacation,\nand neither should anyone who hopes to\ndefend the people!
You tell her, Mitsuhide! Then we can get\ncracking on this training camp.
I can tell her that you're quite insane...
You mean it's not summer without\nVOLLEYBALL!
All right, everyone, let's not fight!\nWhy don't you all take a deep breath?
Ugh... How do they have the energy to be\nso annoying in this HEAT?
Hmmm. Actually... HEY! ALL OF YOU!
You lot have been going on and on about\ndoing the sweatiest things possible in the\nsweatiest weather imaginable.
You've been driven mad, every one of you.\nBy a villain in seasonal clothing!
You heard me. ＂Oh, wow, it's summer!＂\n＂Oh, look, it's the beach!＂ ＂Oh, gee, there's\nnot a cloud in the sky! I LOVE sunburns!＂
This hateful season has you all wrapped\naround its little finger. It's controlling you!
What you're doing isn't enjoying summer;\nit's being a slave to it. You must instead\nturn the tables and seize control!
And...how exactly does one do that?
Simple: we break summer. Bring it to its\nknees. And then we take the reins into our\nown hands.
We stage an uprising—an all-out rebellion\nagainst this season of unsightly backsweat!
Exactly. No longer will it stand laughing\nover our broken bodies in sticky swimsuits!
The enemy is the summer heat!
